DLG SPR_4
Welcome to {wvy}Bric-A-Brac{wvy} Museum! Please buy a ticket and {shk}DON'T TOUCH ANYTHING{shk}. Have fun!

DLG SPR_5
An old pot, it seems empty.

DLG SPR_6
An old bowl, it has markings on the sides.

DLG SPR_7
A diamond, it's very shiny.

DLG SPR_8
An old dagger, it's a bit rusty.

DLG SPR_9
An old tablet, i can't read what it says.

DLG SPR_a
An old necklace, it's really pretty.

DLG SPR_b
A big shell, it's got a chrome inside.

DLG SPR_c
An old ring, it has a pearl on top.

END 0


END undefined
